text: Blabicentrus hirsutulus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Bates in 1866. It is known to inhabit Brazil and French Guiana.BioLib.cz - Blabicentrus hirsutulus. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Desmiphorini Category:Beetles described in 1866
title: Blabicentrus hirsutulus
